name: Codecracker
overview: Codecracker is a 1 - 2 player code breaking game for the 8-bit Atari computer. The player tries to crack a 3 - 5 character code, and can choose to have 1 - 9 turns to try to solve the code. At each turn, the player is told how many characters are correct, but in an incorrect position, and how many of these are in the correct position. In 2-player games, one player gets to input the code, while the other tries to solve it.
